I’m called a sleep expert here at HomeChoice, but truthfully, you can call yourself a sleep expert too. Why? Because you’ve spent a lot of time sleeping – up to a third of your life! This is why I always take customer feedback on our blankets seriously – and you should too if you’re thinking of buying one – because all the comments come from people who have spent time getting to know our blankets.
Click here to view our full range of luxury blankets
The sleep experts in our Facebook community have a lot to say, and we’re always excited to read and learn from their experiences. Here are two of my favourite stories from customers who bought blankets from HomeChoice:
“I have a blanket that I purchased
about 7 years back from HomeChoice
and that’s my best blanket ever.
It’s soft and warm and comfortable.”

Collin Pather
“I bought two blankets, one for my
baby and one for me. My daughter
struggles to get up for work when she
sleeps under her blanket saying,
‘Ai, Mom the blanket is too nice.”

Lorna May Williams

I’ve collected 55 real customer comments about our blankets for you, and to make them fun to read, I’ve put all their important points into a word cloud.
The size of each word/sentence in the cloud shows how many customers said the exact same thing about our blankets. For example, most people thought it was important to mention how warm our blankets are, so the word ‘warm’ is the biggest.

DUDU DLAMINI
The HomeChoice Sleep Expert
Dudu works for HomeChoice helping select the products to enhance our customers’ sleep. As a mother of active twin boys, she is passionate about getting a good night’s rest and firmly believes in the restorative benefits of 8 hours of comfortable, uninterrupted sleep.
